home.tagline: Your ultimate destination for fitness and bodybuilding resources

features.workouts: Create and save workouts, exercises and sets

login.title: Account Access
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account or create a new one
login.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include a number

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.accountExists: Account with this email already exists

login.registerSuccess: Registration successful! You can now log in.

gallery.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

bmi.title: BMI Calculator
bmi.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) to assess your weight category.

interpretations.overweight: Overweight (muscle mass is not considered, high muscle mass leads to an increase in weight which is wrongly interpreted as fat in this calculator and because of that you might appear overweight even if you're not)
interpretations.obese: Obese (muscle mass is not considered, high muscle mass leads to an increase in weight which is wrongly interpreted as fat in this calculator and because of that you might appear overweight even if you're not)

bmr.title: BMR Calculator
bmr.description: Estimate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) to know how many calories you burn daily even if you stay in bed all day (Oxford/Henry method).
bmr.message: This is how many calories you need to eat just to maintain your body and its functions (engaging in physical activity increases this number even more because it requires additional energy).

calorieIntake.title: Calorie Intake Calculator
calorieIntake.description: Calculate your daily calorie needs based on your activity level and goals (higher activity levels increase your daily caloric needs).
calorieIntake.defaultMessage: This is your estimated daily calorie intake for your selected goal.
calorieIntake.defaultDeficitMessage: Default deficit of 500 kcal/day for weight loss.
calorieIntake.deficitMessage: To lose {{weight}} {{unit}} per week, you need a daily deficit of {{deficit}} kcal.
calorieIntake.defaultSurplusMessage: Default surplus of 500 kcal/day for weight gain.
calorieIntake.surplusMessage: To gain {{weight}} {{unit}} per week, you need a daily surplus of {{surplus}} kcal.

activityLevels.2: Extra active (whole day of physical activity - hiking, biking, marathon...)

dietTime.title: Diet Time Calculator
dietTime.description: Estimate how long it will take to reach your target weight.
dietTime.deficit: Daily Calorie Deficit (visit the calorie intake calculator to calculate):
dietTime.message: This is the estimated number of weeks to reach your target weight.
dietTime.targetError: Target must be less than current weight.

cardio.title: Cardio Calculator
cardio.description: Estimate calories burned during cardio exercises.
cardio.message: This is an estimation based on average metabolic equivalents (METs) for your selected activity.

grecian.title: Grecian Ideal Calculator
grecian.description: The Grecian Ideal will calculate your ideal body measurements based on your wrist size and the classic, timeless measurements of the greek 'perfect' male body based on the golden ratio.
grecian.message: These are your Grecian Ideal body measurements.

validation.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

workouts.title: Workouts
workouts.noExercises: No exercises added yet. Add an exercise to get started.
workouts.noWorkouts: No workouts found. Start adding workouts to see them here.
workouts.useAsTemplate: Use a Completed Workout as Template

template.noSavedWorkouts: No saved workouts found. Complete some workouts first.

workouts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this workout?

validation.exerciseRequired: At least one exercise is required
validation.muscleRequired: At least one target muscle is required
validation.setsRequired: Exercise '{{exercise}}' must have at least one set

diet.title: Plan Your Diet
diet.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this meal?

validation.foodsRequired: At least one food is required
validation.positiveValues: All values must be positive numbers

chat.title: AI Coach
chat.howCanIHelp: How can I help you today?

chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

chat.apiKeyMissing: API key is missing. Please contact support.

suggestions.title: Suggested questions
suggestions.workout: How do I create a beginner workout routine?
suggestions.diet: What diet should I follow to build muscle?
suggestions.cardio: How much cardio is optimal for fat loss?
suggestions.progress: What's the best way to track my progress?
